hero.description: Thanks to your collaboration we can help many children.

about.title: We help children foodbanks in Argentina.

item-1.title: Mission
item-1.description: To meet the needs of children and young people in Argentina and Latin America who are in a situation of socioeconomic vulnerability.

item-2.title: Vision
item-2.description: To make decentralized finance a fast, easy, and transparent way to donate and help those who need it most.

item-3.title: Transparency
item-3.description: Blockchain technology allows us to enable you to verify the traceability of your donations.

item-4.title: No borders
item-4.description: Donate from anywhere in the world. Easy and in just a few seconds.

campaigns.title: Últimas campañas
campaigns.description: Gracias a tu ayuda podemos seguir cumpliendo nuestra misión.
